For parent: For child:
\u2022 Let your child launch a bind request and accept it on your phone. Make sure the information you see is correct. After successfully binding your child, you can long press the the child information card to claim your child as lost or found. \u2022 If you decide to unlink your child due to various reasons, left swipe the card and hit unlink. \u2022 Once you claim your child as lost, his/her phone will start sending GPS data to the police every 15 minutes. You will also be prompted to call 911 to provide more information to the police.
\u2022 You can bind your parent using the yellow button with the plus sign. \u2022 If you feel unsafe or is in danger, hit the red button with the excalmatory mark. Your parent and the police will be notified and help you. \u2022 Your location data will only be sent to the police. Your privacy is crucial to us. \u2022 Please make sure that you grant auto-start permission to this app and also turn off battery optimization for it. Otherwise the GPS may not function properly.
